about_the_game: Unlock Mark & Mary's Master Bedroom in this DLC and immerse yourself in their Faroe Islands love story. As newlyweds, they eagerly anticipate the transformation of their space. Redesign their Master Bedroom into a love-filled sanctuary, reflecting their unique bond. Every decorative decision will help shape their intimate refuge, a testament to their blossoming romance. Let's help Mark & Mary begin their happily ever after in a bedroom as enchanting as their love story!
detailed_description: Unlock Mark & Mary's Master Bedroom in this DLC and immerse yourself in their Faroe Islands love story. As newlyweds, they eagerly anticipate the transformation of their space. Redesign their Master Bedroom into a love-filled sanctuary, reflecting their unique bond. Every decorative decision will help shape their intimate refuge, a testament to their blossoming romance. Let's help Mark & Mary begin their happily ever after in a bedroom as enchanting as their love story!

short_description: Dive into Mark & Mary's love story set in the Faroe Islands. In this DLC, guide the newlyweds through the makeover of their Master Bedroom, crafting a romantic refuge just for them.
